title: 820-00165, no backlight, now no image
message: So I was doing what I thought was a routine repair I have done at least 100 times, replacing the backlight driver on an 820-00165. I measured the voltage and was getting 8.1V so I assumed no boosting so I went ahead and replaced the driver IC. well now not only do I get 0V, I get no image, no USB activity. I decided to remove the chip I soldered on and still not working. Double checked that I was using LP8550TLE and that pin 1 was correctly oriented, which it was. I am at a loss here.

title: 820-00165, no backlight, now no image
message: Which voltages and signals do you get present?

title: 820-00165, no backlight, now no image
message: well I get PP3V42, PPBUS is 8.59 and my power supply current is jumping around so I assume between that and 1.8V on VCORE it is alive, but not posting. I'm not sure how something I have done at least 100 times the same way, now it doesn't post.

title: 820-00165, no backlight, now no image
message:
Liquid affected board?
If yes, consider to reball SMC...

title: 820-00165, no backlight, now no image
message: Did that, now working again! Thx
